titleStmt.title: John Stacker et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG6934

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
To His Excellency Thomas E Bramlette
Governor of the Comth of Kentucky.

The undersigned loyal citizens of Lyon County Ky. say that your petitioner L D Park served in the Federal army as stated by him in his affidavit and they present this, their petition in his behalf praying that you be pleased to grant him a full acquittal, from any liability under the indictment in the Lyon Circuit Court,
Aug 8th 1865,

John Stacker Jr.
W. W. Hollman Ex. US. Surveyor
W. H. Long Ex D Pro Mar,
James.T. Long
James Lester
J. W. Harfield
P. P. Lady Co H 17th Ky
Thomas Robinson " "
Wm Holland
B, G, Enice
G. M. Pilant Co H 17th Ky
S Stafford
John S Miller ^15th Ky cav^
Saml Garrett
F M Keating 17th Ky Cav
James H Hopper
W M Johnston
Wm Cash Jr
G, W, Jones
William Jones
William stphens
Alexander Miller
Jesse Newburg 48' ky
Wm M Robertson
John Long
Zach. T. Lewis
John Fritz Co. G. 48th Ky
J H Hackney " " "
M. L. Moneymaker " "
M R Hollman
C Harfiele Ex. D Pro Mar
J. T. Brindley U S Gunboat
H J Chess J. C. J, 17" Ky
B. L. Gatewood
W M Bowman
Geo C. Lester
A H Champion
John H Tucker 15th Ky Cav
J. Lehr
B, C, Ballard
Clark Roland 15th Ky Cav
Marion Roach 15th Ky Ca
Azariah Rice
D. L. Gardner
B. A Dickson
S. A. Cummins (45th Ky)
John R. Duncan 15 ky cav
B F Isaachs
S L Jenkins
Elihu. N. Duncan
James Watson
John S Riley
Columbus Watson 1st Sergt Co H. 20th Ky. V. I
W. J. Nickell
H, K, L Gatewood
I certify that with the exception of three persons the above signers are personally known to me to be loyal citizens of the State of Kentucky.

L D Parks
Petition
Lyon Cir Ct
vs
L. D Parks
